name: bazel-import
description: Automatically add Bazel deps when you import code

bazel-import.buildFile.description: The file name convention where your build targets are defined.

bazel-import.importPathPrefixes.description: Path prefixes that should be considered for auto-adding Bazel deps. An empty array will consider all imports.

bazel-import.targetPrefixes.description: Target prefixes that should be considered for auto-adding Bazel deps.

bazel-import.externalTargets.description: External dependency path prefixes and their associated external build targets.

bazel-import.notifyChange.description: Notify the user that a BUILD.bazel file has been updated.

bazel-import.maxPackageSize.description: The maximum package size for removing dependencies. The larger this number, the slower the extension

bazel-import.maxCacheSize.description: The maximum packages to cache. The larger this number the more memory the extension will use (and it may slow the extension with O(n) for every file opened)

bazel-import.excludeDependencies.description: Add hidden dependencies here to avoid checking them (buildozer won't remove them, so this primarily influences the UI)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
